actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT wt.chapter_tag , wt.roll_number,sd.name , wt.page_count, case
						when wt.status = 1 then 'pdf generated'
							when wt.status = 2 then 'Printed'
							when wt.status = 3 then 'Delivered'
							when wt.status = 4 then 'Reprint Requested'
							else null
						end as worksheet_status 
FROM worksheet.worksheet_track wt
join  app.master_student_data sd
on wt.roll_number = sd.roll_number
where wt.section_id = {{sec.selectedOptionValue}} and wt.chapter_tag ={{Table2.triggeredRow.chapter_tag}} 
order by wt.status asc
